Text:
LATEST COMPUTER GRAPHICS AND REAL LIFE ACCOUNTS yes but there is nothing else in it.
something beetwen reality show and action film.
fast paced stupendous spectacle without any substance.

Is this one the same as the other one on this site except lower quality. Is it all videos in the series? 
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5273266/Human_Body_Pushing_the_Limits_%282008%29_BDRip
Please seed I've seen one of those in tv really worth it!

All those who are interested in neuroscience, physiology or any related area with interesting subjects just ignore the guy who said that there's no good thing in it beyond all the great technology. I'm susrprised with this fact: it was the first documentary where I saw something about lucid dreaming, this one on brain power! Enjoy!

A10/V10
The torrent is very well done and it is a great viewing experience. I do not fathom why it was necessary to RAR episodes 1,2 and 4 (over 700 MB each) when #3 was taken straight to AVI (only 350 MB). Seems to me to be overkill that ends up being counter-productive and not helpful to bandwidth consumption. But that's OK because I really appreciate the effort to share these. Long live BitTorrent! 
This four part series is an incredible experience. If you are a fan of the fictional TV series House M.D., these episodes make a great supplement to the medical technology shown in that series.
All in all, kudos to eddie1969 and thanks.
